user_query: I'm interested in the ICON cryptocurrency and would like to check the balance of my ICON tokens. Retrieve the balance of my ICON tokens at address hx02e6bf5860b7d7744ec5050545d10d37c72ac2ef. Additionally, provide me with the latest news and earning calendar from the financial market to stay informed about the industry.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the balance of ICON tokens at the specified address.
Fetch the latest news related to the financial market.
Retrieve the earnings calendar for the upcoming financial reports.
